Jedi Academy

I expect to be well paid. I'm in it for the money.

Knights of the Old Republic

The Rebel Force

The Empire Strikes Back

Alderaan? I'm not going to Alderaan. I've got to go home. It's late, I'm in for it as it is. I want to come with you to Alderaan. There's nothing for me here now. I want to learn the ways of the Force and be a Jedi, like my father before me. Ye-ha! You are a part of the Rebel Alliance and a traitor! Take her away!

Shannon Moeller, 01/01/2015
